parameters.name: DryRun
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to perform a dry run, without performing the actual request. Valid values:

*   **true**: performs only a dry run. The system checks the request for potential issues, including missing parameter values, incorrect request syntax, and service limits. If the request fails the dry run, an error message is returned. If the request passes the dry run, the `DryRunOperation` error code is returned.
*   **false** (default): performs a dry run and performs the actual request. If the request passes the dry run, a 2xx HTTP status code is returned and the operation is performed.

parameters.name: IsDefault
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to query the default vSwitches in the specified region. Valid values:

*   **true**
*   **false**

If you do not set this parameter, the system queries all vSwitches in the specified region by default.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Maximum value: **50**. Default value: **10**.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID of the vSwitch. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~36063~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

>  You must set at least one of **RegionId** and **VpcId**.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group to which the vSwitch belongs.

parameters.name: RouteTableId
parameters.description: The ID of the route table.

parameters.name: VSwitchId
parameters.description: The ID of the vSwitch that you want to query.

parameters.name: VSwitchName
parameters.description:
The vSwitch name.

The name must be 1 to 128 characters in length, and cannot start with `http://` or `https://`.

parameters.name: VSwitchOwnerId
parameters.description: The ID of the Alibaba Cloud account to which the vSwitch belongs.

parameters.name: VpcId
parameters.description:
The ID of the virtual private cloud (VPC) to which the vSwitches belong.

>  You must set at least one of **RegionId** and **VpcId**.

parameters.name: ZoneId
parameters.description: The ID of the zone to which the vSwitches belong. You can call the [DescribeZones](~~36064~~) operation to query the most recent zone list.
